# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA)

The *Solution-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) Request for Supply Arrangement* (RFSA) is now open for tender. This RFSA is a renewal of the existing SBIPS RFSA in place for 2016 (Refresh EN537-05IT01/M) with EN537-05IT01/N being the new issuance.

## Overview

The RFSA is a comprehensive refresh of the existing SBIPS arrangement, allowing new suppliers to become SBIPS SA Holders and for existing SBIPS SA Holders to qualify for additional streams. The RFSA will cover various professional services, including but not limited to:

* Computer services
* Internet or intranet client application development services
* Internet or intranet server application development services
* Network planning services
* Systems planning services
* Local area network (LAN) maintenance or support
* Wide area network (WAN) maintenance or support
* System analysis services
* Computer hardware maintenance and support

## Requirements

The successful supplier(s) will be required to provide the above services to various locations throughout Canada, with the exception of areas subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements.

## Evaluation Criteria

The RFSA will be evaluated based on variations or combinations of the above methods. A complete list of evaluation criteria can be found in the RFSA document.

## Important Dates

* Tender closing date: July 4, 2028 at 2:00 PM (EDT)
* RFSA issued date: October 4, 2024

## Instructions for Participation

To participate in this RFSA, suppliers must enroll and establish an account in the Supplier Module of the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS) e-Portal. Suppliers must also submit an online response through the CPSS Supplier Module by the tender closing date.

## Compliance with Canada's Industrial and Regional Benefits Policy

Suppliers must comply with Canada's Industrial and Regional Benefits Policy, which includes.rules for set-asides under the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements.

## Notice of Request for Supply Arrangement

The notice for this RFSA is publicly available on the EDC Quotebooks and the PWGSC website. The notice may be accessed through the following links:

* EDC Quotebooks: https://wwwdaequotebooks-edcquotebooks-lc.tpsgc-pwgsc-gc.ca/
* PWGSC Website: https://www.tpsgc-pwg
